message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $9,500 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. Could you do $11,500?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $9,000. Could you meet me halfway and do $10,750?
